problem.p: Are you taking any other courses right now, or using material from a program like Khan Academy, Codecademy, or OCW? Please check all that apply.

checkboxgroup.submitted_message: Thank you for submitting your response.

choice.name: sci/eng
choice.text: Yes, a science, computer, or engineering course.

choice.name: prof
choice.text: Yes, a course for professional certification.

choice.name: other
choice.text: Yes, a course in a different topic.

choice.name: no
choice.text: No, this is the only course I am taking right now.

problem.p: If you are, please tell us which of your courses are online, and which are face-to-face.

stringresponse.answer: It's a survey. There is no right answer.
